titleStmt.title: Additionals to The mystery of Jesuitisme Englished by the same hand.
titleStmt.author: Pascal, Blaise, 1623-1662. Provinciales.

notesStmt.note: Published in Pascal's Les provinciales, or, The mystery of Jesuitisme. London, 1658.
Imperfect: filmed copy dark and difficult to read.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
